DOC.brief_summary: Background . For old adult , serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D ( 25 ( OH ) D ) high 75 nmol/L lower fracture risk attainment 25 ( OH ) D target may require 125 mcg ( 5000 IU ) /d vitamin D3 . Objective : We want characterize safety efficacy fortify bread biologically meaningful amount vitamin D3 .
DOC.brief_title: Nursing-Home Residents Given Bread Fortified With Vitamin D3
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : In single-arm design , 45 nursing-home resident consume one bun/d fortify 125 mcg ( 5,000 IU ) vitamin D3 320 mg elemental calcium .
DOC.criteria: Healthy senior institution Romania Known hypercalcemic hypercalciuric disease
